column4: umm... how do i get a wireless card working if it appears in cardctl identity but doesn't give any network properties?
well, i have a dell minipci truemobile 1150 card that's recognized in cardctl identity
but it won't give any network properties
what is your chipset for your wireless card?
if you will pastebin the results of lspci i MAY be able to help
yeah i can't tell which is your card
i would ask your question again i cant help you maybe someone else can
that might help get you started
